metadata.Title: CVE-2020-36394 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - low.
metadata.Description:
pam_setquota.c in the pam_setquota module before 2020-05-29 for Linux-PAM allows local attackers to set their quota on an arbitrary filesystem, in certain situations where the attacker's home directory is a FUSE filesystem mounted under /home.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-36394` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libpam-modules - 1.5.2-2ubuntu1
libpam-modules-bin - 1.5.2-2ubuntu1
libpam-runtime - 1.5.2-2ubuntu1
libpam0g - 1.5.2-2ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: pam package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.5.2-2ubuntu1').
